Back to White Trash Fast Food White Trash Fast Food: Restaurant Reviews Schonhauser Allee 6-7 , 10119 Berlin , Germany Website 9 visitor photos Ranked #268 of 4,115 restaurants in Berlin 118 Reviews Cuisines: International Good for: Bar scene Dining options: Lunch, Dinner, Reservations, Late Night, Dessert Restaurant details Good for: Bar scene Dining options: Lunch, Dinner, Reservations, Late Night, Dessert Update restaurant details Write a Review 118 reviews from our community 72% Recommend Excellent 38 Very good 48 Average 14 Poor 6 Terrible 12 Rating summary Food Service Value Atmosphere 118 reviews sorted by Date Rating Catherine1981London London Senior Reviewer 10 reviews Reviews in 9 cities 18 helpful votes “Quirky restaurant with great food!” Reviewed December 19, 2008 1 person found this review helpful Quirky, atmospheric restaurant. Manages to be different without being tacky. Great food and huge portions. I had the veggie burritos which were delicious and the next day tried the chilli cheese fries which were also great.The burgers also looked good. Prices were very reasonable. Also a good selection of beers, soft drinks and cocktails. The staff were friendly and spoke good English and the service was quick. The restaurant has different events every night we were there during the week one night there was a live DJ the other night was cinema evening. Definitely recommended for excellent food and something a bit different. Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? Ask Catherine1981London about White Trash Fast Food This review is the subjective opinion of a TripAdvisor member and not of TripAdvisor LLC. A TripAdvisor reviewer on Facebook 8 helpful votes “Great burgers and fries...” Reviewed September 17, 2008 Great burgers and fries. Outrageous decor somewhere between Chinese restaurant and Irish pub. Loads of dancing (hey this is Germany, dancing is not a given), live music and the odd burlesque show. Good fun everytime, one place where everyone is sure to pull. Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? This review is the subjective opinion of an individual contributor and not of TripAdvisor LLC. A TripAdvisor reviewer on Facebook 2 helpful votes “I guess a lot of this place is the atmosphere. Big burgers, big attitude!” Reviewed February 28, 2008 I guess a lot of this place is the atmosphere. Big burgers, big attitude! Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review?
